name: Grand Chase Auto
description:
Grand Chase Auto is a hot pursuit 3D police car chasing game that tests your getaway driving 

skills against street racers cops around the globe.

Buckle up, you are in for wildest car chase game. Take down runaway street racer cops and smash road within 

the most dangerous car chasing sport game now!

Smash the road and see if you'll be able to beat Police in this Game

FEATURES

• Several unlock-able cars with totally different handling!

• All vehicles have their own behavior. Choose your favorite!

• Nice visuals and sound

• Cops vs Thieves chased by police chase car.

• Hot pursuit car chasing game and Smashing cop car games.

• It is an Offline Game so no need of internet

• car race game appropriate for all age groups.
